appupdated.heading: Uygulama güncellendi!

error.filecreatedmsg: Nevertheless, an incomplete export file was still created.
error.heading: Dışa Aktarım Hatası
error.msg: Errors occurred during creating of the record export file for unsubmitted records. Errors: __errors__

success.heading: Dışa Aktarım Oluşturuldu
success.msg: Export file created for all unsubmitted records belonging to this form.

formupdated.heading: Form Güncellendi!
formupdated.msg: Bu biçimin yeni bir uyarlaması indirildi. Güncellenmiş uyarlamayı yüklemek için sayfayı yenileyiniz.

gotonotfound.msg: Failed to find question "__path__" in form. Is the reference to this question correct?

loaderror.editadvice: We do not recommend you edit this record until this is resolved.
loaderror.entryadvice: We do not recommend you use this form for data entry until this is resolved.
loaderror.heading: Yükleme Hatası
loaderror.msg1: Error occured during the loading of this form.
loaderror.msg2: Please contact __emailLink__ with the link to this page and the error message below:
loaderror.msg1_plural: Errors occurred during the loading of this form.
loaderror.msg2_plural: Please contact __emailLink__ with the link to this page and the error messages below:

offlinesupported.heading: Form çevrimdışı çalışıyor!
msg: This form can now be loaded and used without an Internet connection on this device. Bookmark it for easy offline access.
Records are automatically stored and queued in your browser until an Internet connection is available. When the app is online, records will be automatically submitted - one by one.

Only after a record has been succesfully submitted, it will be removed from the queue. You can safely close down your browser and device with items in the queue. They will still be there next time you load the form.

offlineunsupported.heading: Application cannot launch offline
offlineunsupported.msg: Offline application launch is not supported by your browser. You can use the survey without this feature or see options for resolving this.
offlineunsupported.refresh: This form can no longer launch offline. Please refresh the page to try to fix this.

recordnotfound.msg: Record could not be retrieved or contained no data.

savedraftinfo.heading: Finalize record later
msg: The draft record is stored only within the current browser. You can close this browser without losing the stored record.
Draft records can be accessed by reopening this page and clicking the button on the left of the screen that looks like this: __icon__
Warning: If you clear your browser cache, all draft and unsubmitted final records will be permanently deleted.

submission.redirectmsg: You will be automatically redirected after submission.

submissionerror.authrequiredmsg: Authentication required. Please authenticate __here__ in a different browser tab and try again.
fnfmsg: The following media files could not be retrieved: __failedFiles__. The submission went ahead without these files and this succeeded.
Please contact __supportEmail__ to report a bug and if possible explain how the issue can be reproduced.
submissionerror.heading: Submission Failed

thanks.heading: Katılımınız için teşekkürler.
thanks.msg: You can close this window now.
thanks.msgTaken: You have already completed this survey.

validationerror.msg: Formda hatalar bulunuyor. Lütfen kırmızı ile işaretlenen alanları gözden geçiriniz.

valuehasspaces.multiple: Select multiple question has an illegal value "__value__" that contains a space.

xpatherror.heading: Formül Hatası
xpatherror.msg: A formula evaluation error occurred. Please contact __emailLink__ with this error:

autosaveload.heading: Kaydedilmemiş giriş bulundu.
autosaveload.msg: Enketo kaydedişmemiş bir giriş buldu. Bu kaydı yüklemek ister misiniz veya dikkate alma.

deleteall.heading: PANIC!
msg: This will remove all your queued data and all your forms from the browser storage. Data will be lost forever. Use this only as a last resort if the browser storage seems corrupt.
Önce tüm Enketo tarayıcı bölmelerini kapatın.
The page will reload. If you see an error you may have to repeat this action.

discardcurrent.heading: Kaydedilmeyen düzenleme
discardcurrent.msg: The current form has unsaved changes. Would you like to load a record without saving changes to the form you were working on?

login.heading: Kullanıcı Girişi Gerekli
msg: In order to submit your queued data, you need to login. If you want to do this now, you will be redirected, and lose unsaved information.
Would you like to login now or later?

print.heading: Yazdırma Ayarlarını Seçiniz
print.msg: To prepare an optimized print, please select the print settings below
print.reminder: Remember to set these same print settings in the browser's print menu afterwards!

repeatremove.heading: Delete this group of responses?
repeatremove.msg: This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to proceed?

save.existingerror: Kayıt ismi veya numarası zaten mevcut.
save.hint: This name allows you to easily find your draft record to finish it later.

save.unkownerror: An unknown error occurred when trying to save data.

contact.admin: Lütfen anket yöneticisi ile iletişime geçiniz.

home.msg: __appTitle__ is running! Please access Enketo forms from your __serverName__ installation.

imagemap.svgNotFound: SVG image could not be found

modernbrowsers.heading: Modern Browsers

ie.heading: Why no love for those evil outdated versions of Internet Explorer?
ie.msg: We understand that some people, especially those working for large bureaucracies, do not have access to the latest and greatest browsers. Since we know how great the web could be with the right tools, we have great empathy for users in that unfortunate situation. Normally, we would try to provide workarounds to support some populair outdated browsers. However, the reason Enketo exists is the availability of some very fancy cutting-edge technologies. Unfortunately, users of older browsers are therefore out of luck.

modernbrowsers.msg1: Ouch! Sorry, you were probably sent here because your browser is outdated or perhaps it has its key features disabled by using 'private browsing' mode.
modernbrowsers.msg2: If you are using an outdated browser, we recommend upgrading to a recent version of one of the following excellent modern browsers:

offline.heading: İstenen sayfaya ulaşılamıyor
offline.msg1: This page is only accessible when the browser has an Internet connection and the server is accessible (unless the page does not exist).

record-list.msg1: Records are stored inside your browser until they have been uploaded (even if you turn off your computer or go offline).
record-list.msg2: Queued records, except those marked as draft __icon__, are uploaded automatically, in the background, every 5 minutes when the web page is open and an Internet connection is available.
record-list.msg2-nodraft: Queued records are uploaded automatically, in the background, every 5 minutes when the web page is open and an Internet connection is available.
record-list.msg3: To force an upload in between automatic attempts, click Upload.
record-list.title: Kuyruk

error.iosusesafari: Your iOS browser is not able to run this form. On iOS, we recommend using Safari.
error.notavailable: Browser storage is required but is not available, is corrupted, or is not writeable. If you are in 'private browsing' mode please switch to regular mode, otherwise switch to another browser. (error: __error__)
error.notsupported: Your browser is not able to run this form. We recommend using a modern browser.

submission.http400: Data server did not accept data.
submission.http403: Not allowed to post data to this data server.
submission.http404: Submission service on data server not found.
submission.http4xx: Unknown submission problem on data server.
submission.http500: The data server for your form or the Enketo server is down. Please try again later or contact __supportEmail__.
